long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Donkey Kong is a classic arcade game that has been adapted as a Chrome Extension, allowing you to play it for free on the website https://monkeymart.org/. In Donkey Kong, you take on the role of Mario, the famous video game character, as he tries to rescue his girlfriend Pauline from the clutches of the giant gorilla Donkey Kong. The game features multiple levels filled with obstacles and enemies that Mario must overcome by jumping over barrels, climbing ladders, and avoiding hazards. It's a challenging and exciting game that has stood the test of time and continues to be enjoyed by players of all ages.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://monkeymart.org/
